```{r,echo=F}
ab = sample(2:9,2)
a = ab[1]*0.1
b = ab[2]*10

```




Question
========

Evaluate the product.

$$`r a` \cdot `r b`$$



Solution
========

First, recognize that $`r a`=`r a*10`\cdot 0.1$ and that $`r b`=`r round(b/10)`\cdot 10$.

You can rewrite the product...
$$(`r a*10` \cdot `r round(b/10)`) \cdot (0.1\cdot 10)$$

$$`r a*b` \cdot 1$$

Multiplying by 1 keeps the number the same.


$$`r a*b`$$

============

exsolution: `r a*b`
exname: mult_tenth_tens
